body:
Hey guys, I have just been wondering if anyone knows how to fix the problem I'm currently getting when I try to launch Minecraft. The Minecraft launcher works perfectly fine but when I press "Play" I get this clear screen that can see what is behind it. I haven't been on Avicus in a while now because of this problem so that is why I am here today to ask if anyone knows how to fix it.

Problem:
body_tagged:

Problem:
title: Clear Screen Problem

replies.body:
I believe that this may be an issue between 1.7.10 and your version of Java. Try using 1.7.9 that's what I use and it works fine. However I haven't experienced this issue. Hope it helps!!

cheers
